actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for volunteer firefighters.
short_title: Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008

summary.text: Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow volunteer firefighters with eight or more years of service a $1,500 tax credit ($1,000 for three or more years).

titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for volunteer firefighters.
